brand_identity.name: SPA Publication Group
brand_identity.visual_style: Modern Scholarly - A blend of classic print aesthetics (serifs, whitespace) with modern digital precision (grids, micro-interactions).

usage_rules.h1: font-serif text-5xl md:text-7xl font-medium tracking-tight leading-[1.1] text-primary
usage_rules.h2: font-serif text-4xl md:text-5xl font-normal tracking-tight text-primary mb-6
usage_rules.h3: font-serif text-2xl md:text-3xl font-medium text-primary mb-4
usage_rules.caption: font-sans text-sm font-semibold tracking-widest uppercase text-accent

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-none px-8 py-6 text-sm font-medium tracking-widest uppercase transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:border-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-none px-8 py-6 text-sm font-medium tracking-widest uppercase transition-all duration-300

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: rounded-none border-slate-200 focus:border-[#C5A059] focus:ring-[#C5A059]/20 bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm

navigation.wrapper: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-100

hero_image.usage: Hero section background or split layout image

about_image.usage: About Us section or Team intro

texture_bg.usage: Subtle background for 'Our Companies' or 'Stats' section

guidelines.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' }}

anti_ai_rules: NO generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
NO 'Inter' font for headings. Use Cormorant Garamond.
NO full-width gradients. Use subtle textures or solid blocks.
NO default Shadcn styling. Customize borders (rounded-none) and shadows.
Use 2x more whitespace than you think is necessary.
accessibility: All images must have alt text
Interactive elements must have focus states
Use semantic HTML (section, article, main, nav)
testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., data-testid='submit-manuscript-btn')

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the frontend for SPA Publication Group. Follow the JSON structure strictly. Use the provided image URLs. Implement the 'Modern Scholarly' aesthetic by combining the Serif headings with the clean Sans body. Use the 'Deep Navy' and 'Academic Gold' colors to create a sense of prestige. Ensure the 'Our Companies' section uses a Bento Grid layout. The 'Publications' section should be clean and filterable. Use 'sonner' for toasts and 'lucide-react' for icons.
